definitions: the action of breathing noisily through the nose due to a cold or crying

examples.text: the season of sneezing and snuffling

shortDefinitions: action of breathing noisily through nose due to cold or crying

definitions: the making of repeated sniffing sounds as though smelling at something

examples.text: a snuffling of snouts in the trough

shortDefinitions: making of repeated sniffing sounds as though smelling at something
